Texture: The texture from which to create the vector field.
ConstructionOp: The operation used to construct the vector field.
VolumeSizeX: The size of the volume. Valid sizes: 16, 32, 64.
VolumeSizeY: The size of the volume. Valid sizes: 16, 32, 64.
VolumeSizeZ: The size of the volume. Valid sizes: 16, 32, 64.
SubImagesX: The number of horizontal subimages in the texture atlas.
SubImagesY: The number of vertical subimages in the texture atlas.
FrameCount: The number of frames in the atlas.
FramesPerSecond: The rate at which to interpolate between frames.
NoiseField: A static vector field used to add noise.
NoiseScale: Scale to apply to vectors in the noise field.
NoiseMax: The maximum magnitude of noise vectors to apply.
bLoop: Whether or not the simulation should loop.
